body_html:
I have manage to find a way to restore CudnnLSTM model on CPU.
Here are jupyters with example: https://gist.github.com/melgor/41e7d9367410b71dfddc33db34cba85f

The main problem was variable_scope which need to be set in proper way.
body_text:
I have manage to find a way to restore CudnnLSTM model on CPU.
Here are jupyters with example: https://gist.github.com/melgor/41e7d9367410b71dfddc33db34cba85f
The main problem was variable_scope which need to be set in proper way.
body:
I have manage to find a way to restore `CudnnLSTM` model on CPU. 
Here are jupyters with example: https://gist.github.com/melgor/41e7d9367410b71dfddc33db34cba85f

The main problem was `variable_scope` which need to be set in proper way.
